**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 36 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31 [Sulvik](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2067) **Source** [Pathfinder #182: Graveclaw](/Sources.aspx?ID=143) pg. 56 **Perception** +21; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +21, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +19, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +18 **Str** +6 **Dex** +3 **Con** +4 **Int** -2 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +4 **Independent Brains** Each of Sulvik's heads rolls its own initiative and has its own turn. Neither head can [Delay](/Actions.aspx?ID=77). At the start of a head's turn, that head gets 2 actions and 1 reaction. Each brain controls its own tongue and one of Sulvik's arms, but both can move the legs. Any ability that would sever Sulvik's head (such as the [_vorpal_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=308) weapon property) doesn't cause him to die if he has his other head, but does cause him to lose the turns, actions, and reactions of the severed head. [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effects that target a single creature affect only one of Sulvik's heads.Perception +11; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) --- **AC** 27 **Fort** +21 **Ref** +16 **Will** +16 **HP** 190 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Resistances** piercing 10, slashing 10 **Mohrg Spawn** ([occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) When Sulvik kills a living creature of 8th level or less, that creature rises as a [mohrg spawn](/Monsters.aspx?ID=729) after 1d4 rounds, on its turn. This mohrg spawn is under Sulvik's command. If Sulvik is destroyed, the mohrg spawn is destroyed as well, immediately collapsing into a pile of decayed flesh and bones.
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** --- **Speed** 35 feet **Melee** claw +21 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d10+12 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Melee** tongue +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** paralysis **Paralysis** ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) A living creature hit by Sulvik's tongue Strike must succeed at a DC 28 Fortitude save or become [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28). The creature can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each attempt.
